entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bump version of ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.1.0.7455 #69613
  • LSIF generator should implement 'standard error protocol' and report exceptions, health, and performance metrics #69610
  • In .editorConfig UI there's no way to push a setting from Visual Studio settings to the editorConfig file #69604
  • Semantic snippets: possible duplication/wrong modifier order after `partial` keyword #69600
  • Semantic snippets: type snippets should have different valid modifiers #69599
  • Semantic snippets: postfix inline statement snippets are not shown if the next statement starts with a contextual keyword treated as identifier #69598
  • Go to Definition fails over LSP for source generated files #69595

Closed

  • Codelens to get the references on fields is missing #69583
    Backlog
  • VS Code extension does not provide CodeLens for fields #69606
  • Generic constraints should prune out candidates for method group natural type #69222
    17.9
  • Inference of function type should only consider one extension scope at a time #69042
    17.9
  • Possible bug related to `UnscopedRef` introduced in 7.1.200 #67626
    17.8
  • Regression in 7.0.200 when using UnscopedRef on a property #67697
    17.8
  • Interface implementations don't inherit default members #69601

PullRequests

Created

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add reproducer for is-pattern temp issue #69615
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cherry-Pick #69497 #69612
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cherry-Pick #69497 #69611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report misplaced unchecked in cref as warning #69609
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update doc for IsRecord #69607
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Cache substituted base type #69605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add locals to binder from out vars in array rank specifiers on local functions #69597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8

Merged

  • Include CodeLens on remaining types and members #69608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions" #69582
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move helpers for 'use collection expression'. #69581
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Support creating binlogs for the language server's design time builds #69572
    Area-IDE
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add EA support so that asp.net can create instances of the 'Add Nuget Package' code fix in a lightbulb. #69586
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update compiler toolset to latest #69544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement ref switch expressions #69575
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
